Name: Drifting Kings
About the game: Drifting Kings is Stylized Arcade offline/online Drifting/Touge/Gymkhana racing game with a colorful and stylized environments. fun to play ,hard to master. The Art Of Driving Sideways Challenge Ai and Online Friend in Various track in more than 14 Tracks including the most famous Track compound Ebisu(Kita, nishi, Touge, Higashi, Minami). Drive throw Snaking downhill terrain in the ultimate test of man and machine in more than 6 locations inspired by japan mountains roads(Fuji, Akagi, Myogi, and more) Maneuver through the course Layout As Fast as Possible in the ultimate gymkhana play ground. more than 30 Challenging course Layout Its you and your machine against time drive fast and avoid hitting the obstacle ,But remember to memorize the Layout Each mode has its own cars Find the best car for your need. Show off your virtual photography Skills with the Photo mode . Challenge the AI in the Single Player Career mode Drift/Touge and collect all points. Challenge your self in Single Player Career gymkhana mode and collect all points and beat other players on the leaderboard. The game has controller and wheel support and allows to manually change the button mapping in-game.
